content.prompt: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of household disposable income in Mexico based on the data in the graph?

choices.label: It was higher in 2004 than in 2006.
It was higher in 2011 than in 2009.
It was lower in 2006 than in 2007.
It was lower in 2015 than in 2013.
